Authors: William J. Sabol, Ph.D., Heather C. West, Ph.D., and Matthew Cooper
Appendix table 22: Prisoners in custody of correctional authorities in the U.S. territories and commonwealths, yearend 2007 and 2008

column2: Commonwealth of the Northern Marina Islands

column1: a/The number of prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year per 100,000 persons in the resident population. July 1, 2008 population estimates were provided by the U.S. Census Bureau, International Data Base.
b/Includes estimates for 2008. Data not available for Guam at time of publication. See Methodology.
